attributes.action: Batman shooting - Ban gun exports to the USA
attributes.additional_details:
A murderer killed 12 people in America on the 20th of July 2012, during a screening of Batman. He used a Glock model 22 handgun, manufactured in Europe.

Someone killed 32 people in Virginia Tech in 2007. He used a Glock and a Walther P22, another European gun.

In 2008, 11,493 people were murdered with guns in America. A huge proportion of those guns were made in the UK, Germany, and Austria.

We can't change American gun laws and we can't stop them from shooting each other. But we can stop them using our guns to do it. We can make the price of murder more dear.

The government should press for an EU-wide ban on the export of handguns to the United States.
